title: Fix missing “No” button in question phase (redo visibility + positioning)

requirements.text: Ensure the “No” button is visibly rendered immediately during the question phase (when “Will you be my Valentine?” is shown) and does not start overlapped/hidden behind the “Yes” button.

quotes: BRO THERE IS STILL NO "NO" BUTTON. redo IT

acceptanceCriteria: After the intro countdown ends and the question phase appears, both buttons labeled exactly “Yes” and “No” are visible at the same time without any user interaction.
The initial “No” button position does not overlap the “Yes” button and is clearly readable/visible on both desktop and mobile viewport sizes.
The “No” button is not visually hidden due to stacking order (z-index), transparency, or being positioned behind other elements.

requirements.text: Constrain the “No” button’s evasive movement to remain within the visible bounds of the question button area so it cannot move off-screen or under other UI (including the footer).

quotes: BRO THERE IS STILL NO "NO" BUTTON. redo IT

acceptanceCriteria: On repeated hover attempts, the “No” button always remains fully within the visible bounds of the question phase button area (no clipping/off-screen).
The “No” button remains clickable/hoverable and continues to move away on hover across multiple attempts.

requirements.text: Fix the “No” button attempt counter/message escalation logic so dramatic messages trigger at the intended attempt counts during the question phase (no stale state issues).

quotes: BRO THERE IS STILL NO "NO" BUTTON. redo IT

acceptanceCriteria: Dramatic messages appear consistently at the intended attempt milestones during hover attempts (e.g., 3rd, 5th, 7th+ attempt as defined by the implementation), without being delayed by one interaction.
The “No” button continues to shrink slightly after each failed hover attempt down to the defined minimum scale.

constraints: Keep the app as a single self-contained page (no routing); primary logic remains in frontend/src/App.tsx.
Do not load any external images, audio files, or animation libraries; all visuals via CSS/inline SVG/Canvas and all audio via Web Audio API.
Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or other paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not change the “Yes” troll finale sequence timing/copy beyond what is necessary to fix the missing “No” button behavior.
Do not add backend features or persistence; backend/main.mo should remain unchanged unless strictly required.
